output:
Waking up at 1pm to my mother questioning where I've been
Go downstairs, turn on the TV, check my phone for messages from you
Call a few of my old friends, they have plans, not including me
Guess I'll go back to bed, sleep a few more hours till you're home
It's a shame, a minute without you feels just like a waste of my own time
It was 2 in the morning when she turned to me and said
It's okay to miss the things that you love in life, you love in life
